snippet: F. Sherwood Rowland, who endured relentless challenges for warning that chlorofluorocarbons were depleting the ozone layer, is dead at 84.
abstract: F. Sherwood Rowland, who endured relentless challenges for warning that chlorofluorocarbons were depleting the ozone layer, is dead at 84.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Saluting a Colossus of Chemistry
